message: TEST MESSAGE: We have received a rapid response target-of-opportunity trigger, approved 2024-11-08T13:00:00. This target has been given temporary ToO Obs ID: 20241109. OPRM generation is in progress, to be delivered in time for ATS upload during pass at 2024-11-12 00:03:23 (MLD_13M1). Target is expected to be bright, additional contacts will be requested.
